Spanish: ir a un festival de música
English: to go to a music festival

Spanish: jugar (a un videojuego, a las cartas, al ajedrez, al fútbol, al baloncesto...)
English: to play (a video game, cards, chess, football, basketball...)

Spanish: perder (la/una carrera, la/una competición, una medalla)
English: to lose (the/a race, the/a competition, a medal)

Spanish: tocar (un instrumento, la batería, la flauta, la guitarra, el piano, el violín...)
English: to play (an instrument, the drums, the flute, the guitar, the piano, the violin...)
